short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free tools for performing various calculations with fractions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Polyfractions provides a set of tools for performing various calculations with fractions, such as :

- Adding, subtracting, dividing or multiplying two fractions.
- Simplifying a fraction.
- Finding the quotient of a division problem.
- Computing the greatest common divisor of two numbers.
- Calculating the modulo (remainder) of a division.
- Converting a mixed number into a decimal.
- Calculating a fraction's value of a given number.

Clicking the "All" link will take you to our website, where you will find additional online tools, as well as detailed steps and explanations of the calculation results.
